Will Reactions be included in the game? Like D&D 5e?

While it's not going to be in EA immediately, the features and mechanics that allow a character to perform an action as a reaction will be added in the official launch.

Are there classic magic items from the existing D&D source material?

Yes, there will be a mixture of magic items from published DnD materials and some homebrew items of similar complexity and power
